data.description: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Assault Mag + Reconstruction + Recombination

PvP: Fluted + Assault Mag + Slideshot/Reconstruction/ALH + Snapshot/Killing Wind/Moving Target/Recombination

Recombination x5 can one body all resilience levels. Slideshot and Killing Wind both boost OHKO range and do stack when both are active. Heritage’s base range stat is good enough to spec into a handling barrel and Assault mag (no range stat boost should be needed).
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Assault Mag + Reconstruction + Recombination

PvP: Fluted + Assault Mag + Slideshot/Reconstruction/ALH + Snapshot/Killing Wind/Moving Target/Recombination

Recombination x5 can one body all resilience levels. Slideshot and Killing Wind both boost OHKO range and do stack when both are active. Heritage’s base range stat is good enough to spec into a handling barrel and Assault mag (no range stat boost should be needed).
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Extended Mag + Reconstruction + Vorpal/Recombination
PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted + Accurized + Killing Wind/Moving Target + Snapshot
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Extended Mag + Reconstruction + Vorpal/Recombination
PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted + Accurized + Killing Wind/Moving Target + Snapshot
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Extended Mag + Reconstruction + Vorpal/Recombination
PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted + Accurized + Killing Wind/Moving Target + Snapshot

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Reconstruction/Rapid Hit/FTTC + Demo/Rampage/One For All

(One For All is much better on primaries, but some may prefer Rampage due to the ease to proc)

PvP: Hammer Forged + Accurized + Killing Wind/Rapid Hit + Opening Shot/Rampage 

(Rampage makes this 3 tap at x2 stacks on all Res [x1 stack can 3 tap at 3 res or lower)

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Reconstruction/Rapid Hit/FTTC + Demo/Rampage/One For All

(One For All is much better on primaries, but some may prefer Rampage due to the ease to proc)

PvP: Hammer Forged + Accurized + Killing Wind/Rapid Hit + Opening Shot/Rampage 

(Rampage makes this 3 tap at x2 stacks on all Res [x1 stack can 3 tap at 3 res or lower)

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Reconstruction/Surplus + Wellspring/HIR

Reconstruction and HIR work extremely poorly together, as HIR only procs on the last ¼ of the original mag size, not the newly increased mag size.

PvP: Fluted/Arrowhead/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Accurized + Killing Wind/Reconstruction/Surplus/Under Pressure + Opening Shot/HIR/EotS

Reconstruction and HIR work extremely poorly together, as HIR only procs on the last ¼ of the original mag size, not the newly increased mag size.
HIR and Under Pressure on the other hand work excellently together, as they both proc on the same part of the mag

PvP: Fluted/Arrowhead/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Accurized + Killing Wind/Reconstruction/Surplus/Under Pressure + Opening Shot/HIR/EotS

Reconstruction and HIR work extremely poorly together, as HIR only procs on the last ¼ of the original mag size, not the newly increased mag size.
HIR and Under Pressure on the other hand work excellently together, as they both proc on the same part of the mag

PvE: Jagged Edge + Swordmasters/Balanced Guard + Relentless/Thresh + En Guard/Assassins Blade

(This sword is an interesting case. Without the combo of Relentless Strikes + Whirlwind Blade to allow it to stack up against other swords for boss damage, you have to get creative. Relentless + En Guard can give some good quick burst of damage, while Thresh + Assassins Blade could have it’s place against Taniks as Div.)

PvP: It really doesn’t matter

PvE: Jagged Edge + Swordmasters/Balanced Guard + Relentless/Thresh + En Guard/Assassins Blade

(This sword is an interesting case. Without the combo of Relentless Strikes + Whirlwind Blade to allow it to stack up against other swords for boss damage, you have to get creative. Relentless + En Guard can give some good quick burst of damage, while Thresh + Assassins Blade could have it’s place against Taniks as Div.)

PvP: It really doesn’t matter
